Interface Store

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Branch, OnlineStore

    public interface Store
extends java.lang.Cloneable
    An interface that has the common methods of Branch and Online Store classes.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void changeNo(int newNo)
      Changes the number of the store.
      void changeStock(Product addedProduct, int amount)
      Changes the amount of the product that will be given as addedProduct.
      java.lang.Object clone()
      Makes a copy of the store.
      int getNo() 
      Product getProduct(int index)
      Returns a product from the stock with the given index.
      int isInStock(Product searchedProduct)
      Searchs for a product in the stock of the store.
      void printStock()
      Prints the stock of the store.

    • Method Detail

      • getNo

        int getNo()
        Returns:
        the store number

      • printStock

        void printStock()
        Prints the stock of the store.

      • changeStock

        void changeStock(Product addedProduct,
               int amount)
        Changes the amount of the product that will be given as addedProduct.
        Parameters:
        addedProduct - is the product that will be added to/remove from the stock of the store.
        amount - determines how many will be removed or added to the stock.

      • isInStock

        int isInStock(Product searchedProduct)
        Searchs for a product in the stock of the store.
        Parameters:
        searchedProduct - is the product that will be searched in the stock of the store
        Returns:
        the index that the product is stored in the store, if there is at least 1 one it.

      • clone

        java.lang.Object clone()
                       throws java.lang.CloneNotSupportedException
        Makes a copy of the store.
        Throws:
        java.lang.CloneNotSupportedException

      • getProduct

        Product getProduct(int index)
                   throws InvalidIndex
        Returns a product from the stock with the given index.
        Parameters:
        index - is an integer that will be the index of the product that will be searched in the stock of the store. It cannot be less than 0 or bigger than 118.
        Returns:
        the product that is inside the stock with the given index value.
        Throws:
        InvalidIndex - if the given index does not meet the requirements.

      • changeNo

        void changeNo(int newNo)
        Changes the number of the store.
        Parameters:
        newNo - will be the new number of the store.
